description.value: The type of DMERC supplier. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/dmerc_line_supplr_type_cd

display.value: Clinics, groups, associations, partnerships, or other entities for whom the carrier's own ID number has been assigned.

definition.value: Clinics, groups, associations, partnerships, or other entities for whom the carrier's own ID number has been assigned.

display.value: Physicians or suppliers billing as solo practitioners for whom SSN's are shown in the physician ID code field.

definition.value: Physicians or suppliers billing as solo practitioners for whom SSN's are shown in the physician ID code field.

display.value: Physicians or suppliers billing as solo practitioners for whom the carrier's own physician ID code is shown.

definition.value: Physicians or suppliers billing as solo practitioners for whom the carrier's own physician ID code is shown.

display.value: Suppliers (other than sole proprietorship) for whom employer identification (EI) numbers are used in coding the ID field.

definition.value: Suppliers (other than sole proprietorship) for whom employer identification (EI) numbers are used in coding the ID field.

display.value: Suppliers (other than sole proprietorship) for whom the carrier's own code has been shown.

definition.value: Suppliers (other than sole proprietorship) for whom the carrier's own code has been shown.

display.value: Institutional providers and independent laboratories for whom employer identification (EI) numbers are used in coding the ID field.

definition.value: Institutional providers and independent laboratories for whom employer identification (EI) numbers are used in coding the ID field.

display.value: Institutional providers and independent laboratories for whom the carrier's own ID number is shown.

definition.value: Institutional providers and independent laboratories for whom the carrier's own ID number is shown.

display.value: Clinics, groups, associations, or partnerships for whom employer identification (EI) numbers are used in coding the ID field.

definition.value: Clinics, groups, associations, or partnerships for whom employer identification (EI) numbers are used in coding the ID field.

display.value: Other entities for whom employer identification (EI) numbers are used in coding the ID field or proprietorship for whom EI numbers are used in coding the ID field.

definition.value: Other entities for whom employer identification (EI) numbers are used in coding the ID field or proprietorship for whom EI numbers are used in coding the ID field.
